lead_paragraph: PLAYER In the Netherlands, the Brazilian striker Afonso Alves scored an Eredivisie-record seven goals in Heerenveen’s 9-0 victory over Heracles Almelo on Sunday. Alves, 26, has played five times internationally for Brazil and was the Dutch league’s top scorer last season with 34 goals in 31 games.
